ing: 2 (28 ounce) cans peeled and diced tomatoes
des: "This recipe was brought back from Italy by my husband's grandfather.  It is a family favorite!  For sauce with meatballs, shape 6 pounds ground beef into balls.  After sauce has simmered, place meatballs in sauce and simmer for additional 4 to 5 hours.  Stir occasionally."
ins: Grind onion, pepper and garlic in meat grinder.  In a large saucepan combine ground vegetables, whole tomatoes, diced tomatoes, tomato puree, tomato paste, tomato sauce, vegetable oil and Italian seasoning. Bring to boil; reduce heat to simmer for 4 to 5 hours.  Stir occasionally.
